alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Meade County through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Mud Butte, or 37 miles west of Faith, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairpoint and Stoneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
